column4: Did Jaunty remove support for virtual consoles (Ctrl-Alt-F[1-6]) or is that a bug?
its a bug, for me i have to press ctrl+alt+f1 twice before it gets me to vt
Doesn't work. The first time I hit Ctrl-Alt-F1, I get the X console again. After that, it's just a blank screen
Yeah, I've heard that before. No longer bothering to. Sorry.
Seems like what I have is different from the LP link. I have not been able to see a text console *at all* since I "upgraded" to Jaunty
what video card do you have?
which chipset? did u enable dri2 and UXA acceleration?
How do you check that again?
00:02.0 VGA compatible controller: Intel Corporation 82G35 Express Integrated Graphics Controller (rev 03)
no. The only thing vaguely special is the dual monitor, but it worked with Intrepid IIRC
hm, i've seen something similar to your issues on an ati card. but intel worked fine for me.
FWIW the Intel driver is broken differently on my other machine -- dri enabled and yet 3D goes at software rendering speed
intel released new driver for jaunty, it breaks some cards.
